data.message: Hi i buy diet coke all the time its the only one i like, other than still water, i have been looking for the pin code on my can but the letters under the ring pull are not right does the pack have to be a promotional  pack please

replies.message: Hi Sue, thanks for getting in touch. Our competition codes can only be found on promotional packs, look out for the four new pack designs in your local stores. For more info check out http://spr.ly/61838FXB3 :)
